column4: Elyo naba ikaka ichi salu mu mukoshi. Nepo ikele nipa mulu we tebulo
column5: Pa chitunshitunshi ili, pamulu pali naka ukui kopelako nga ule chi bomfya
column6: Nechinso chambwa ine iyi chile moneka pa chitunshitunshi chi palile icha ku kopelako bachishile icha aka

column2: Imbwa shibili isha masako ayengi shile butuka pa fyani. Chile moneka kwati iyili kunuma ile pepeka iyili ku ntanshi
column3: Shile moneka nashi naka sana muku butuka mumi monekele efyo shile posa amolu kuntanshi
column4: Futi shile moneka kwati kuti shaba imbwa shamu mpanga ishi
column5: Nashi palanako nefyo imoneka chimbwi
column6: Nashi palanako lelo te chimbwi. Shifwile shakulafye sana shakwata nama sako ayafita ayengi sana

column2: Abantu aba pusana pusana na beminina panse ya ma tuka aya shitisha ama lamya elo bambi bale ipitilafye
column3: Elyo kule moneka naku talala. Pantu naba fwala ifya mpepo
column4: Pali naba kote babili, namayo na shitata na beminina nenkonto chila muntu. Bale moneka bali pamo
column5: Bale moneka kwati bale chesha. Chifwile kale ba monenepo
column6: Chifwile chali kale. Umu kashana umo nankwe naiminina pa chibi che tuka lyama lamya

column2: Abaiche batatu bale peluka pa chimpelwa chimo elyo umo umwaiche naikala panshi pa lunkoto
column3: Bale moneka bali fye pa ng'anda epo bale angalila. Naba temwa no kutemwa pa Chippewa bekele
column4: Elyo icho bekelemo pa chimpelwa bachi panga kwati chibale ichi kalamba
column5: Nachiyi bela ichi bale bomfya abaiche.
column6: Elyo nabekatisha kuntambo baletina ukupona

column2: Abaiche na beminina pa bulalo ubwa pangwa nefimiti elo bambi bali mu menshi taba fwele nangu chimo
column3: Kunuma kuli utu mitenge utwa fyani beminike. kule moneka kwati niku ka mushi uku kwine abaiche bale angalila
column4: Nangula limbi tulya utumi sakuta twa fyani kumbali wa mumana eto bekalamo nga bale loba isabi nangu imilimo shimbi ku mumana
column5: Efyo chile moneka pantu tabatu chinga bwino bwino nge ng'anda
column6: Ubulalo nabo ba pangafye nefimuti elyo bwaba ubwe ongama

column2: Abana aba lumendo bale angala pa lunkoto nabekata notumiti kuminwe utwa kuteyelako efyo bale teya
column3: Balei posela akamu pila aka nono eko bale bomfya uku teya ichangalo bale teya
column4: Bonse naba fwala no tuputula nama tulopiko kumakasa
column5: Babili, naba fwala ifyaku mulu ifya palana. Elo panshi pale moneka ichimuti ne chakufwala naba posa
column6: Ichimuti baposele panshi chifwile chakwangalilako ifi fine bale angala

column2: Aba kalamba na baiche bale angala pa tu menshi utu nono pa musebo eto bale isansa
column3: Chi fwile naku kaba sana echo bale angalila mutu menshi utule sabuka
column4: Tule moneka utu menshi utu twikalile pa musebo eto bale isansa
column5: Abengi taba fwele insapato, niba bili fye aba kwete ifyaku molu
column6: Nomwana bemishe nankwe naba mufwika insapato

column2: Imbwa shine naba shi kaka intambo pamo mumikoshi elyo shi letinta ichi nininepo shikulu bantu
column3: Ishi mbwa bale bomfwa ukui pulanya shile moneka bashi fumya mu mpanga. Pantu nashi ibelako
column4: Elyo shile moneka shili mulubilo shali belela uku bomba inchito ine iyi
column5: Efyo chilemoneka, limbi esho ba bomfya ukwenda umu mu mushi
column6: Bafwile esho babomfya pamulandu wa menshi yakosa pa misebo

column2: Umu lumendo uwa chaiche ale tolokela pa menshi elyo aba fyashi bakwe ba le mutamba
column3: Chifwile ale sambilila pantu baliko fye ba tatu uku ku nchende bali
column4: Inga ale sambilila inga bachiba nankwe mumenshi uku tila enwena. Nomba ale moneka alishiba kale uku samba ukumwena kufyo atolweke
column5: Chishinka, limbi naku kabisha, ale fwaya omfweko bwino. Pantu kuli, aka suba sana
column6: Kule moneka nakukaba elyo alifye eka ule angalila ku menshi aya. Elyo kuli ichapala ubwendo echo bapanga icha kwingilamo ukwisa ponena pa menshi

column2: Impanga ishingi shile enda mu ka musebo aka mumpanga nalimo shi lelya ifyani
column3: Kunu kwa shiko kuli mbwa. Ile moneka inchito yakwe yaku chingilila impanga nga kwaisa aba lwani
column4: Nangu limbi ile shimona ukuti shiya eko tashi lingile ukuya
column5: Efyo, pantu tapale moneko muntu ule shitungulula kuntanshi
column6: Naka shila kene kale moneka emo shipita lyonse ukuya eko shilila noku bwelela emo shilala

column2: Imbwa na itoloka mu fyani kwati ile tolokela aka nama ile fwaya ikate
column3: Limbi ile fwaya ukwi kata aka nama. Mu mukoshi nabai fwika impapa
column4: Nayimya namatwi mumulu chi palile efyo ile tolokela nafi isenda amano sana
column5: Efyo chipalile, pantu ile moneka ile butukisha noku butukisha
column6: Elyo itali sana nokonda mumimonekele ifwile ya lubilo sana

column2: Imbwa ile enda panono panono pa mushili uwa talala na menshi aya kosa
column3: Chile moneka kwati kuli aba tangile ku ntanshi ebo ile konkamo. Pantu panshi pale moneka ama kasa yachila pita
column4: Efyo chi palile kwati ile konka aba chilapita emo ilepita. Ifwile ifumine nabo mu mpanga ile moneka kunuma
column5: Limbi yalaba sanga pantu nai kwata ichaku konkamo
column6: Yala basanga elyo ifwile yali wishiba nomusebo. Kuti yaba nunsha neko bele kaili ifwila na iswata akachena kabo

column2: Abaiche aba lumendo bale angala panse. Ba bili bale teya umupila elyo bane bale ishafye
column3: Abe kele, bekele panshila apa kwi ngilila mu chikulwa icha fya kulya. Nomba chifwile tabe swile
column4: Muku chimona ituka lya fyakulya ili lyali leka uku bomba pantu pale monekafye fiko fiko
column5: Ifyo chile moneka, pantu pamo naba chinga nefi malata ifya nshimbi
column6: Nabaice babili bekele pa mwinshi wakwi tuka line, eku mona kuti tapaba nabengilamo

column2: Imbwa iya buta ile enda ileya kumo elyo ile lolesha kumbali kwati yamona fimo
column3: Nai tampa no kwimya uku twi kumo. Chipalile ile fwayo ukulwa. Pantu no muchila naimya
column4: Elyo na ikwata ne ntambo ya mpapa mu mukoshi eyo ba ifwika abene
column5: Limbi abene eba chiyi tuma muku tola ichili kukanwa
column6: Ilemoneka iswilefye akanwa panono, tamule moneka ifilifyonse imishe

column2: Imbwa iyilemoneka iya bomba na iminina naipunamina mumulu ile lolesha ka bola ba iposele
column3: Kunuma kuli aka mumana. Chile moneka, emo yachi bombela
column4: Ifwile ya chila kangasisha mu mumana ka bola kene aka
column5: Limbi yachika tola apa abene bale fwayo kuka posela mumenshi nakambi. Echo iminine ifi
column6: Ka bola kene kale moneka nga kalya abantu babomfya ukuteya umupila babomfya ifi miti ukuteya uwitwa ati tennis

column2: Banamayo aba fwele fimo fine ifya buta bale shana uku lemoneka kwati ni kuntanshi kwa bantu nangu abantu taba le monekela mu chikope ichi
column3: Naba fwala ifya palana sana. Limbi bale moneka kwati libumba iya fyaku shana
column4: Libumba lya fyaku shana elyo kuli notu ma laiti utwa balala kumulu utu lesanika
column5: Chifwile kale bambo uku pekanya imishanine iyi pantu naba fwala bwino sana
column6: Kale batampa uku pekanya pantu mu mishanine bale shana ifya palana elyo bale moneka bale konkana bwino sana ukwabula uku lufyana
